parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set the state of a given task.

State value may be one of:
*"None"
*"Created"
*"Assigned"
*"Succeeded"
*"Failed"
*"Canceled"

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setTaskState''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_tskKillSpongebob [[setTaskState]] "Succeeded";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Tasks]], [[createSimpleTask]], [[removeSimpleTask]], [[setSimpleTaskDescription]], [[setSimpleTaskDestination]], [[setTaskResult]], [[taskState]]
</value></part></template>
